Sophos detected trojan and/or virus Troj/JavaDl-AN, aka Mal/JavaDldr-B and automatically deleted it.

However it reported seeing Mal/Keygen-F and searching Sophos I found an alt. description page.

So 3 things could be happening. There is a trojan in the keygen, Sophos is lying and trying to remove keygens, or both.
